title: SEO - Semrush Blog
description: Search engine optimization is the foundation of any digital marketing strategy. Here is everything you need to know.
content: General SEO11 min readWhat Is SEO? An Intro to Search Engine OptimizationSEO (search engine optimization) is an effort to get more unpaid visibility in search engines like Google.Rachel HandleyOct 04, 2024Local SEO13 min readLocal SEO: What Is It & How to Do ItLocal SEO is the process of improving search visibility, traffic, and brand awareness for local businesses.Carlos SilvaJun 25, 2024Keyword Research19 min readKeyword Research for SEO: What It Is & How to Do ItKeyword research is the process of finding & analyzing what relevant audiences search for in search engines.Rachel HandleyJun 25, 2024Link Building16 min readLink Building for SEO: A Guide to the BasicsLink building can give you the SEO edge you need to get more Google traffic. Here‘s your quick-start guide.Rachel HandleyApr 25, 2024General SEO7 min readSemrush Copilot: Your AI Assistant for Faster SEO InsightsSemrush Copilot helps you save time in common SEO analysis and planning. It does this by automatically analyzing several key Semrush tools and reports to offer actionable recommendations and present a prioritized list of SEO activities.Brenna KellyMar 19, 2024Link Building12 min readWhat Is Off-Page SEO? A Guide to Off-Page SEO StrategyOff-page SEO is a set of strategies, such as link building, used outside of a website to improve its rankings.Carlos SilvaFeb 16, 2024Technical SEO7 min readHow to Check Website Accessibility in 2024Is it time to check your website accessibility? Remember that accessibility is about improving the user experience for everyone – including people with disabilities.Luke HarselFeb 14, 2024Technical SEO14 min readWhat Is Technical SEO? Basics and Best PracticesTechnical SEO is the process of optimizing a website for search engines.
